ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] No luck on the gemcutter =(
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm if it only certain gems try these:  Ruby, Sapphire, diamond, Star Rose Quartz and any other faceted gems (they will have the sharp angles in the pictures,
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm if it only certain gems try these: Ruby, Sapphire, diamond, Star
Rose Quartz and any other faceted gems (they will have the sharp angles
in the pictures, pearls, amber,cat eye agate, malachite,lapisl lazuli,
etc. are not faceted)

/Phebos

Joe D wrote:
>
> On Tue, May 23, 2000 at 07:44:09AM -0700, Gazamel Prime wrote:
> > I tried it on a Black Pearl, and nothing happened
> > either. Holding the gem and right clicking on the
> > cutter didn't work, and neither did holding the cutter
> > and right clicking on the gem.
> >
> Maybe it only works on some gems, and not others.
>
> I'm thinking of stepping into Permafrost before the next Vox raid, and
> asking for any diamond dust that pops up...
>
> Pasketti, Povar
